home.paragraph1: Hi, I am Olmeiro, I like to learning all technologies related to Javascript. I recently finished Team International Bootcamp learning Node.js with React.
home.paragraph2: As a Javascript developer, I put all my efforts into learning everyday, I am always open to starting new projects to boost my career as a Javascript Developer. Do not hesitate to contact me.

contact.title: Let's work together
contact.paragraph: Let's build the future. If you want to reach out me call me or fill out the next form.
contact.footer: I hope to hear from you.
